abilities.name: Spirit Mark
abilities.details:
Kimiko gains increased movement speed while being unseen by the enemies. Each time Kimiko reveals herself, her next basic attack with a short timeframe deals bonus magical damage (scaling with magical power) and mark the target.

Hitting a marked target with her basic attacks and Bewitching Dance deals additional magical damage (scaling with magical power) to the target and grants herself a small burst of movement speed.

abilities.name: Bewitching Dance
abilities.details: Kimiko's next three basic attack will gain increased attack speed, with each basic attack dealing bonus magical damage (scaling with magical power) to the target and surrounding enemies, while briefly slowing the target's movement speed.

abilities.name: Illusion Veil
abilities.details:
Kimiko becomes stealthed and leaps to an ally unit. If the target is an ally hero, Kimiko and the ally will become briefly stealthed.

Enemies will be able to very briefly see an after-image of Kimiko's dashing animation at the location she leapt from. When the ally enters stealth mode, the same after-image will also apply, very briefly indicating the direction the ally was moving before becoming stealthed.

If Kimiko or her ally attacks or uses an ability while stealthed, the stealth effect will be removed.

abilities.name: Fox Fire
abilities.details:
Kimiko sends out a Fox Fire that gains vision around it. If the Fox Fire spots an enemy hero, it will run toward it and explode on the first enemy contact, dealing magical damage (scaling with magical power) to nearby enemies and revealing them for a while.

If no enemy hero is spotted, the Fox Fire will stay still upon reaching the end of its target direction and explode after a few seconds, briefly leaving the vision field there. The explosion deals the same magical damage.

abilities.name: Enthralling Gaze
abilities.details:
Kimiko unleashes a wave of irresistible charm, dealing magical damage (scaling with magical power) and charms all enemies hit.

When charmed, enemies will slowly walk towards Kimiko while also take increased damage from Kimiko.
